content:
Sure! Here is a song that I think would fit Avicii's style:

Verse 1:
The sun is shining bright
The music's playing loud
It's a beautiful day
And I'm feeling alive

Chorus:
This is the life, the life we love
We dance and sing, under the stars above
It's a feeling we can't get enough
This is the life, the life we love

Verse 2:
The beat is moving fast
The energy is high
We're living in the moment
And we're ready to fly

Chorus:
This is the life, the life we love
We dance and sing, under the stars above
It's a feeling we can't get enough
This is the life, the life we love

Bridge:
So let's raise our hands
And let the music take control
We're living in the moment
And we're never letting go

Chorus:
This is the life, the life we love
We dance and sing, under the stars above
It's a feeling we can't get enough
This is the life, the life we love

Outro:
The sun is setting now
The music starts to fade
But the memories will last
And we'll do it all again

I hope you like it! Let me know if you want me to make any changes.
